news.text:
Simon Adkins

is playing Don Lockwood in Singin' in the Rain, Upstairs at the Gatehouse.

John Alastair

recently filmed on The Wrong Man's 2.

Ruth Alfie Adams

most recently played Brenda in Stratford East production of Fins Ain't Wot They Used To Be.

Stephane Anelli

recently completed his reprisal of the leading role of Cosmo in the Singin' in the Rain UK Tour and Japan.

Simon Anthony

is Jimmy in the very well received production of White Christmas at West Yorkshire Playhouse.

Audrey Ardington

will be seen in the feature film London Road.

Jenni Banerjee

recently filmed The Secret Lives for Talkback Finland playing Katariina Mäkelä.

Suzy Bastone

plays Tiffany in the feature film Monochrome.

Gareth Berliner

can be seen in Coronation Street as the semi regular Macca.

Matt Blair

plays Mr Drayton in Suffragette due for release 2015.

Kieran Brown

is currently in Phantom of the Opera and has played the Phantom several times this year.

Wendy Mae Brown

is shooting on Man Down 2 following her recent success playing Oda Mae Brown in the UK Tour of Ghost.

Phillip Browne

is back from a very successful period performing globally on luxury liners.

Nick Butcher

has reprised his role in Barnum previously at Chichester Festival Theatre for the UK Tour.

Criselda Cabitac

was recently seen in the Gala Concert Performance of Miss Saigon and can currently be seen in the film The Paranormal Diaries.

Claire Cage

played the defence barrister in the trial storyline in 7 episodes of Coronation Street and recently filmed Holby as her character of Natalie Fletcher from the sister programme Casualty.

Stefano Cassetti

filmed on the German feature film Outside the Box.

Heather Chasen

can be seen in the award winning feature film Les Misérables.

Ellie Chidzey

can be seen in the feature film The Right Juice playing the female lead role of Sally.

Flaminia Cinque

has just completed filming Suspicion for the Discovery Channel and the radio play Victory directed by Richard Eyre.

Charlie Clapham

appears in Kickass 2 and continues as wonderful regular, Freddie, in Hollyoaks.

Anna Marie Cseh

filmed in Paolo Sorrentino's Youth and her short film Skin is being well received on the festival circuit.

Fo Cullen

was most recently seen in 2 episodes of the TV drama, Line of Duty.

Lex Daniel

was seen in 24: Live Another Day.

Victoria Donovan

plays Vicky in Who Needs Enemies released on DVD.

Eileen Dunwoodie

filmed on Ghostwriter for FFP New Media.

Peter Hamilton Dyer

is in rehearsals at Shakespeare's Globe for The Changeling and The Broken Heart.

Manal El-Feitury

will soon be rehearsing for Streets the Musical prior to which she was in Exhibit B at the Barbican.

Brett Fancy

shot the feature film Untitled and has been voicing a new Computer Game.

Francesca Fenech

was recently seen in Our Town at the Almeida following her run as Tracey in Hairspray at the Gordon Craig Theatre.

Daniel Fletcher

reprised his role of Denis Dupree in Rock of Ages UK Tour and then climbed Mount Kilimanjaro for charity.

Jye Frasca

recently filmed on Galavant and has acquired his Green Card.

Pooja Ghai

was recently the assistant director for the Infidel at Stratford East.

Jennie Goossens

most recently seen at the Jermyn Street Theatre in Flowers of the Forest.

Tina Gray

seen in a recent episode of Doctors, is currently in rehearsals for 2 theatre productions, The Pier & The Singing Stones.

Simon Green

filmed an episode of Mr Selfridge and was recently seen in 24: LIve Another Day.

John Hales

was nominated in the BAFTA Breakthrough Brits and continues developing various writing projects of his own and comissioned work.

Douglas Hansell

is currently performing in the Wharf Review for the Sydney Theatre Company.

Lesley Harcourt

was seen at The Edinburgh Festival in the productions This is Ceilidh (you may have been lucky to catch the West End performances of this) and The Collector, which subsequently transferred to The Arcola Theatre.

Elizabeth Healey

will commence filming on Caden in the New Year.

Simon Hepworth

was seen in several episodes EastEnders, filmed on Tulips and shortly commences rehearsals for the title role in King Lear for the Guildford Shakespeare Company.

Rendah Heywood

recently workshopped a new production Mrs Assad and Me.

Joan Hodges

filmed on Pompidou! for the BBC.

Daniel Hope

can be seen in Wicked in the ensemble with a Boq cover.

Amy Howerska

has booked many of her tour dates for her Stand Up for 2015.

Simon Hubbard

recently completed filming series 8 of George Gently in which he plays regular PC Taylor.

Cameron Jack

recently filmed on Silent Witness.

Edmund Kente

recently filmed the pilot of Knifeman, as well as episodes of Mr Selfridge, Downton Abbey and Vicious.

Mark Killeen

most recently completed filming on Clavius opposite Joseph Fiennes and is heavily featured in Street Fighter: Assassin's Fist recently lauched on DVD.

Daniel Kobbina

was in the National Theatre production Hotel and has just completed filming on the next series of Science of Stupid.

Daniel Koek

has recently launched his second album High following his successful year playing Jean Valjean in Les Misérables.

Akira Koieyama

is filming on location for Strikeback and is one of the leads in Street Fighter: Assassin's Fist recently released on DVD.

Haruka Kuroda

has completed filming on her third series of Officially Amazing and she can currently be seen in Usagi Yojimbo at Southwark Playhouse.

Joshua Lacey

was most recently seen alongside Martin Freeman in Richard III.

Frances Leak

has recently graduated from Guildford School of Acting.

Tom Lister

can be seen in the very well received UK Tour of Calamity Jane playing Wild Bill Hickock and continues in his charity work for Hope for Justice.

Sion Lloyd

is playing Abanazar at the Belgrade Theatre Coventry.

Andy Mace

is currently playing the walking cover of Scar and Pumba in the West End production of The Lion King.

Amy Marchant

can currently be seen in Shakespeare In Love at the Noel Coward Theatre.

Gavin Marshall

was recently seen in the production Letters Home for Grid Iron in Edinburgh.

Eliza McClelland

was recently seen in Noises Off and The Late Edwina Black at Suffolk Theatre.

Sarah Moss

is playing the title role in Conderella at Colchester Theatre.

Kay Murphy

can be seen in the RSC's award winning production of Matilda playing the role of Mrs Wormwood.

Lucy Newman-Williams

recorded the radio show The Awakening for Women's Hour.

Benjamin Noble

is the writer and producer of The Outside In which has been successful on the festival circuit.

John O'Dowd

is celebrating winning best sitcom with the rest of the cast and crew of Moone Boy at the British Comedy Awards.

Owen O'Neill

has booked several tour dates for his stand up gigs.

Mercy Ojelade

was most recently seen at The Royal Court in their 10 line plays event.

Mateo Oxley

was a member of Soho Theatre's Young Playwrights Actors Company.

Dharmesh Patel

was most recently seen in the Bush Theatre's production of Albion.

David Peart

recently filmed on Mission Impossible 5 and Mr Selfridge and was seen at The Bush Theatre's production of Mary & Frank.

Jason Pennycooke

can be seen at The Shaftesbury Theatre playing Bobby in the production Memphis.

Lauran Rae

is playing Inanna in Aladdin at Cambridge Arts Theatre prior to which she was in Hairspray in Macau.

Katie Ray

recently returned from a Seabourn cruise where she was a principle vocallist.

Michael Riseley

is playing Montparnasse in Les Misérables at the Queens Theatre.

George Rossi

has recently been seen on our screens as a guest lead in daytime drama Doctors.

Ethan Rouse

is the voice of Peter in the animated series Mike the Knight.

Joseph Rye

is rehearsing for the Finborough Theatre's production of Pig Girl.

Sean Sloan

is about to start rehearsals for God of Carnage at the MAC Belfast.

Kiruna Stamell

is currently reprising her role of Wendy in the National Theatre's production of Great Britain at the Haymarket Theatre, and will appear in the Christmas episode of Holby City.

Sam Spiegel

recently filmed on the feature film The Honourable Rebel.

Marvin Springer

was most recently seen in Porgy & Bess at the Open Air Theatre Regents Park, prior to which he was in Sunny Afternoon at Hampstead Theatre.

Colin Starkey

recently filmed the feature film A Slight Trick of the Mind playing Dr Watson and a guest lead in an episode of Holby City.

Bradley Taylor

filmed the short film Out.

Natalie Taylor Gray

is currently a vocalist on the Oceania Riveria liner.

Oliver Thornton

currently playing Arthur in Camelot at the Two River Theatre in New York City.

Sara Topham

recently completed the run of Love Me Do at The Palace Theatre Watford.

Sadao Ueda

recently filmed feature London Has Fallen and for TV productions, I Live With Models and Vicious.

Steve Varnom

filmed on the feature film God the Father.

Oliver Watton

currently playing Jack in Jack and the Beanstalk in Yeovil and was recently seen in a guest role of Casualty.

Anna-Marie Wayne

is currently touring with War of the Worlds.

Anne Wittman

recently filmed an episode of Suspicion for the Discovery Channel.

Emma Woods

is the choreographer of Cinderella at Basildon Theatre.
